Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $10,000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it provides, I believe this is an exceptional opportunity for you. I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This exclusive offer is valid for a limited time, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. Should you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
